title: XCSRoot
description: Root schema for all ContextSuite data types. It references individual schemas for entities, semantic events, etc.

entity.description: Schema definition for a ContextSuite Entity.

semantic_event.description: Schema definition for a ContextSuite Semantic Event.

time_series.description: Schema definition for a ContextSuite Time Series.

data_point.description: Schema definition for an individual Data Point within a Time Series.

uom.description: Schema definition for a Unit of Measure (UOM).
